line_1: We'll send you up another sheet,
line_2: Soon then as business will permit,

line_1: In taper find no winding sheet;
line_2: Nor sleepless mind the death-watch beat;

line_1: As many rows as furnish up a sheet:
line_2: As many lines as fill a row complete;

line_1: So here, compress'd within a single sheet,
line_2: Great things and small, the mean and mighty meet,

line_1: Rais'd just above the milk-white Sheet.
line_2: Nor glows so red, nor breathes so sweet.

line_1: Counts Writers Merits by the Sheet.
line_2: Tonson, who is himself a Wit,
And here we were to meet;

line_1: Or lay the landscape on the snowy sheet,
line_2: To teach the canvass innocent deceit,
With a vest of the crim'sy meet;
